head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Witness Says Man Told Of Killing

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Brooklyn: Witness Says Man Told Of Killing

body.head.byline: By MICHAEL BRICK; Compiled by John Sullivan

abstract.p: Michael DiLeonardo, Gambino captain testifying as government witness, says Dominick Pizzonia, who is on trial for 1992 murders of Thomas and Rose Marie Uva of Queens, told John A Gotti that he was going to go after couple and kill them because they had robbed Mafia social clubs (S)

block.p: A government witness testified in Federal District Court yesterday that the man charged with the 1992 killing of Thomas and Rose Marie Uva of Queens, a young couple who robbed Mafia social clubs, had previously said he planned to take revenge. The witness, Michael DiLeonardo, a Gambino captain, testified that the defendant, Dominick Pizzonia, made the statement to John A. Gotti outside a social club where patrons had been robbed. ''He told John he was going to go after them,'' Mr. DiLeonardo said. ''He was going to kill them.''
